title: America’s Kidz Got Singing
description: America’s most talented kids sing for a panel of celebrity judges. Will they escape the harsh feedback of Jenna Maroney?
quote: Go jump back up your mother!
altHero: a young boy sings in front of an American flag backdrop
alt1: a young girl looks tiny singing on a giant stage
alt2: a judge’s table with Jenna Maroney, John McEnroe, and D’Fwan
alt3: Jenna Maroney giving feedback with a smile
alt4: a young girl in an adorable dress holds a microphone and looks dejected
